Welcome

To Glance Packaging Private Limited

Glance Packaging Private Limited is a profound Kolkata (Baguiati) based manufacturer & supplier of metal containers. Starting its journey in the year 2010, is now amongst the leading manufacturers for producing the best quality of Metal Containers, Drums, Packaging containers. Currently the company is producing around 1700 drums per day and have manufacturing unit of producing more than 6 lakh drums per annum.

It is known to provide top service in the following categories:

Container Manufacturers

MS Drum Manufacturers

Packaging Container Manufacturers

Metal Container Manufacturers

Check out our

Products

READ MORE

Power Press Machine

It mainly creates top & bottom of a drum and also use for bung fitting purposes etc.

Seam Welding Machine

It helps to join or weld the sheet from the middle to form a complete circle.

Seaming Machine

It helps us to fit the top & bottom of a drum.
